attributes.title: Alexa
attributes.review: This app I expected more actually not really what can u expect from a racist person the app is worst than I thought dumb stupid it should be nonexistent trump shouldnâ€™t even exist wait is he rapist or racist he has feeling for his own daughter thatâ€™s disgusting a human bean like him shouldnâ€™t exist neither should he have a app to himself there is only crap and bs on there â¤ï¸

attributes.title: AWFUL, SO BAD, AND HORRIFIC
attributes.review: This app truly makes me OFFENDED that it is even on the App Store. I might have to switch to a google phone because I can not stand it being on this platform and that I would support it!!!!! It was gruesome and horrifying to me and my entire family. I hope it is deleted IMMEDIATELY or I will have to take action into my own hands.

attributes.title: Never getting an app for a president ever again!!!
attributes.review: When I opened the app and entered my number, I started getting THOUSANDS of texts sending me pictures or leaked Donald J. Trump photos!! It was HORRIFYING. Then, when I thought the messages stopped, I checked my bank account and saw that ALL of my money was taken and sent to this app!!!! I. am. now. traumatized. and. broke.

attributes.title: Are you serious??
attributes.review: My phone number was apparently leaked because of this app and now i have to get a new phone number! iâ€™m horrified because i have been recieving death threats and that iâ€™m being followed.I was so excited for this app but it did me so so wrong this is disgusting get this off the app store now my life is now in danger
